The megacity of NEONFALL never stops bleeding.
You've fought through its streets, survived its gang wars,
and left corpses in alleys where nobody asks questions.

One megacorporation controls it all, but muscle still talks.
You are {operator_name}, MERCENARY.
Your augments are tuned for combat. Your reflexes, faster than human.
You operate in District Theta-5's red zones,
where only the strong survive and the weak disappear.
Tonight is your first sanctioned run. A chance to prove your worth.
Or to become just another casualty.
